Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO PROCUREMENT AND CONTRACTS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO PROCUREMENT AND CONTRACTS

Title: Requires contracting agencies to contact minority and women-owned business enterprises when such enterprise is listed on a utilization plan and when a contract is awarded
Summary: Requires contracting agencies to contact minority and women-owned business enterprises when such enterprise is listed on a utilization plan and when a contract is awarded; mandates that the prime contractor use such enterprise identified on the utilization plan, unless such enterprise cannot perform or is no longer state certified.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring contracting agencies to contact minority and women-owned business enterprises when such enterprise is listed on a utilization plan and when a contract is awarded
